description: This file defines a Python class TwilioTools that provides an interface to interact with Twilio's API, including sending SMS, fetching call details, and listing messages. It includes methods for validation, initialization with different authentication methods, and logging.

classes.name: TwilioTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Twilio API, supporting SMS sending, call detail retrieval, and message listing.

methods.name: validate_phone_number
methods.description: Validates if a phone number is in E.164 format using regex.

methods.name: send_sms
methods.description: Sends an SMS message via Twilio, validating phone numbers and message content.

methods.name: get_call_details
methods.description: Fetches details of a specific call using its SID.
